Field Detail

parameters

protected final WidgetMakerParameters parameters
Constructor Detail

AbstractWidgetMaker

public AbstractWidgetMaker(WidgetMakerParameters parameters)
Widget Makers will take, as input to their constructor, Widget parameters which they can later use as they make their intended Widget.

Parameters:
parameters -
Method Detail

getNameForField

protected String getNameForField()

Determines and returns the name for the dialog field. The name is the relative path to where any authored input using the resultant widget will be housed in the content repository.

When useDotSlashInName is true, the string './' will be prepended to the determined name.

Returns:
The name property of the DialogField annotation if one is provided, otherwise the result of the getName() method.

getFieldNameForField

protected String getFieldNameForField()
Returns:
The fieldName property of the DialogField annotation if one is provided, the result of the getName() method otherwise.

getFieldLabelForField

protected String getFieldLabelForField()
Returns:
The fieldLabel property of the DialogField annotation if one is provided, null otherwise.

getFieldDescriptionForField

protected String getFieldDescriptionForField()
Returns:
The fieldDescription property of the DialogField annotation if one is provided, null otherwise.

getIsRequiredForField

protected Boolean getIsRequiredForField()
Returns:
required property of the DialogField annotation.

getAdditionalPropertiesForField

protected Map<String,String> getAdditionalPropertiesForField()
Returns:
Name Value pairs represented by the additional properties tied to the DialogField annotation, or null if no such properties are defined.

getDefaultValueForField

protected String getDefaultValueForField()
Returns:
The defaultValue property of the DialogField annotation if one is provided, null otherwise.

getHideLabelForField

protected boolean getHideLabelForField()
Returns:
The hideLabel property of the DialogField annotation.

getListeners

protected Listeners getListeners()
Returns:
The Listeners object configured via the listeners property of the DialogField annotation or null if no such configuration is defined.

getName

protected String getName()
Returns:
When the widget is represented by a field in the Java class, this method will return the name of the field. When the widget is represented by a method in the Java Class, the string 'is' or 'get' is stripped from the method name if it starts with either of these strings, and then returns the resultant string.

isField

protected boolean isField()
Returns:
True if the Widget is represented by a field in the Component class, false otherwise.

isMethod

protected boolean isMethod()
Returns:
True if the Widget is represented by a method in the Component class, false otherwise.

                throws ClassNotFoundException
Parameters:

Returns:

hasAnnotation

public boolean hasAnnotation(Class<?> annotationClass)
Parameters:
annotationClass - The type of annotation to look for on the Widget element
Returns:
True if an annotation of the type specified is associated with the field or method representing the Widget being made, false otherwise.
